item.title: Very large pothole, caused flat tyre., 28th December
item.description:
Very large pothole near the construction site entrance. To be honest, this entire road needs to be resurfaced as the potholes along this main stretch are horrendous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: From bafford approach all the way to the national speed limit going up the hill. Cirencester road is in an appalling state. Continuous surface imperfections, bodged previous repairs. It needs fully resurfacing. Utter embarrassment p, 28th December
item.description:
From bafford approach all the way upto the golf course the Cirencester road is in an appalling state and is genuinely uncomfortable, annoying and embarrassing to drive along. Please can it be resurfaced as it's had bodged pothole repairs and surface imperfections.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 283, Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hanging metal sign on railway bridge above the road, 28th December
item.description:
The metal sign is hanging significantly above the road causing harm to passersby if it were to fall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Dead fox and a deer. They've been there for a couple of weeks!, 28th December
item.description:
The dead animals are on the Cheltenham bound carriageway on the stretch between the bridges that cross over the bypass.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy manhole cover, been steadily getting worse for months. Was fixed temporarily a few years ago and again when the road was re-surfaced, but problem has returned. Sounds like gun fire and can be continuous during busy periods. The buses going by every 10mins is like a bomb going off. Making our lives a misery, please help., 28th December
item.description:
Just before the junction of Green Lane on left hand side of carriageway heading towards Glos, outside 117
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 123, Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins Rubbish Bags & Cage, 28th December
item.description:
This is the alleyway entrance to The Minster HERITAGE site. The owners of Black & Gold and the air BNB property (Cheltenham Borough Council?) are not controlling the access of this public entrance. The empty cage has been there for at least one month. The bins are often overflowing and not secured. This is an absolute disgrace given the amount of money spent on The Minster Heritsge Churchyard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bennington Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burgage Stores, 28th December
item.description:
Area to the side of Burgage Stores covered in rubbish and storage cages. Public bin alongside overflowing. Is this the public realm? This area is shockingly maintained and is an untidy hotspot in a generally tidy village.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linden Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
